mapper.select:
select count(1) from sys_org d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.code = #{code}
and d.id != #{id}
select a.* from sys_org a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.sort ASC
select a.right_num from sys_org a where a.id = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.right_num desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_org ( id, parent_id, left_num, right_num, code, name, name_py, type, level, state, sort, del_flag, remarks ) values ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{leftNum}, #{rightNum}, #{code}, #{name}, #{namePy}, #{type}, #{level}, #{state}, #{sort}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
